name: Jana Kováčová
title: Team Lead, ON Semiconductor Slovakia
feedback: Daniel's impact on our development team was transformative. He architected and implemented a sophisticated cloud monitoring system that revolutionized how we track and analyze our operations. His mastery of Node.js and React wasn't just about writing code - it was about creating a scalable, maintainable system that hundreds of our employees now rely on daily. His technical decisions continue to influence our development practices positively.
